actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on Commerce.
The previous question was ordered on the amendment and on the bill without objection.
On agreeing to the Commerce amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute allows traffic synchronization projects to proceed as soon as they are approved and funded, before conformity determinations required by EPA are made.
purpose: An amendment recommended by the Committee on Commerce in the version of the bill as reported by that Committee.
